gyms.title: Gym 1
gyms.description: Located in the heart of Rotterdam, Gym 1 offers world-class Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu training with experienced instructors.

gyms.title: Gym 2
gyms.description: Situated near the Rotterdam Central Station, Gym 2 provides top-notch BJJ classes for practitioners of all skill levels.

gyms.title: Gym 3
gyms.description: With a focus on technical excellence, Gym 3 in South Holland offers a welcoming environment for BJJ enthusiasts.

gyms.title: Gym 4
gyms.description: Located in a vibrant neighborhood of Rotterdam, Gym 4 provides a variety of BJJ programs suitable for beginners and advanced practitioners alike.

gyms.title: Gym 5
gyms.description: Gym 5 offers a friendly community and expert BJJ instruction to individuals looking to improve their skills in South Holland.

gyms.title: Gym 6
gyms.description: Situated near the Maas River, Gym 6 is a well-established BJJ academy known for its dedicated trainers and comprehensive training programs.

gyms.title: Gym 7
gyms.description: With a focus on self-defense and sport BJJ, Gym 7 in Rotterdam provides a safe and supportive environment for practitioners of all ages.

gyms.title: Gym 8
gyms.description: Gym 8 offers BJJ classes taught by experienced black belt instructors, catering to both recreational practitioners and competitive athletes.

gyms.title: Gym 9
gyms.description: Situated in the southern part of Rotterdam, Gym 9 focuses on the fundamentals of Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu, providing a solid foundation for all students.

gyms.title: Gym 10
gyms.description: With state-of-the-art facilities and a team of dedicated instructors, Gym 10 offers a dynamic training experience for BJJ practitioners in South Holland.
